abstract: Albany lacrosse star Lyle Thompson, who played the last three seasons with his brother Miles and cousin Ty, is preparing to begin 2015 season alone as both Miles and Ty finished their collegiate careers in 2014; Thompsons were first Native Americans lacrosse players in upstate New York to attend a Division I university other than Syracuse, and Lyle is widely considered the best player of his generation.
lead_paragraph: After three successful seasons playing collegiate lacrosse with his brother and cousin, Lyle Thompson will finish his collegiate career at Albany without his familiar teammates.

headline.main: Lacrosse Star Carries Familiar Mantle in a Transitional Year
headline.print_headline: Peerless Player Carries Family’s Mantle Alone
headline.seo: Lyle Thompson, Who Succeeded Among Family Members, Begins This Season Alone

snippet: After three successful seasons playing collegiate lacrosse with his brother and cousin, Lyle Thompson will finish his collegiate career at Albany without his familiar teammates.

keywords.value: State University of New York at Albany
keywords.name: organizations
